sig_info: When gaining Telepathic Charges from any source other than this ability Stryfe has a 5 to 20% chance to gain +1 additional charge.
Whenever cauing a Basic Attack to Glance, Stryfe has a 10 to 30.03% chance to Activate his Special 1 Invisibility for 3 seconds.
Winning a fight converts 25 to 60.04% of Telepathic Charges into Persistent Telepathic Charges.

PSIONIC BLASTS: Psionic blasts occur on Medium, Heavy and several hits in Special 2, these attacks are Psychic, deal Energy Damage instead of Physical and cannot be Evaded.
Reduce the Potency of incoming Passive Direct Damage by 100%.
TELEPATHIC CHARGES - MAX 20: Telepathic Charges are unaffected by Ability Accuracy reduction but cannot be gained while suffering Power Lock, Burn or Drain.
All attacks gain +2.49 Attack Rating per Telepathic Charge.
55% chance to gain +1 Telepathic Charge when landing a Heavy Attack. Chance increased by a flat 15% for each full Bar of Power.
Gain +1 Telepathic Charge when struck by a Critical Hit.
Gain +1 Telepathic Charge each time Stryfe or his Opponent Misses.
When Struck at 5+ Telepathic Charges, consume 5 charges to cause the attack to Glance.
Striking an Opponent or into their Block while they are Unstoppable consumes +2 Telepathic Charges to remove the effect and inflict a Passive Stun for 1.20 seconds. Cooldown 8 seconds.
ON FOURTH LIGHT ATTACK: Consume 1 Telepathic Charge to inflict a Passive Concussion for 12 seconds reducing the Opponent's Ability Accuracy by 20%.
While the Opponent is suffering from Concussion Stryfe can block Unblockable attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Deal a burst of 20.75 Energy Damage. +500% potency if Invisible.
Gain +3 Telepathic Charges if Invisible.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The second hit in this attack inflicts a non-stacking Passive Shock, dealing 87.15 Energy Damage over 8 seconds. This Shock is removed and reapplied on each Psionic Blast.
After this attack ends, activate a telepathic cloak to go Invisible for 3 seconds, giving the Opponent a 100% chance to Miss. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.
If Stryfe lands an Attack, Blocks an attack, or the Opponent activates a Special Attack, his position is revealed and Invisibility is removed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The first hit and final 2 hits in this attack are Psionic Blasts, each dealing a burst of 24.9 Energy Damage. +80% potency if the Opponent is Shocked.
Psionic blasts gain +4.98 Attack Rating per Telepathic Charge.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain +5 Persistent Telepathic Charges, these last for the rest of the quest but are capped at 100.
Consume all Telepathic Charges, each becoming +1 additional Persistent Telepathic Charge.
Persistent Telepathic Charges cannot be consumed to trigger abilities, but still grant Attack Rating bonuses.
If the Opponent is Shocked, inflict a Passive Concussion for 30 seconds reducing the Opponent's Ability Accuracy by 30%.

sig_info: When gaining Telepathic Charges from any source other than this ability Stryfe has a 5 to 20% chance to gain +1 additional charge.
Whenever cauing a Basic Attack to Glance, Stryfe has a 10 to 30.03% chance to Activate his Special 1 Invisibility for 3 seconds.
Winning a fight converts 25 to 60.04% of Telepathic Charges into Persistent Telepathic Charges.

ON FOURTH LIGHT ATTACK: Consume 1 Telepathic Charge to inflict a Passive Concussion for 12 seconds reducing the Opponent's Ability Accuracy by 20%.
While the Opponent is suffering from Concussion Stryfe can block Unblockable attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Deal a burst of 27.5 Energy Damage. +500% potency if Invisible.
Gain +3 Telepathic Charges if Invisible.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The second hit in this attack inflicts a non-stacking Passive Shock, dealing 115.5 Energy Damage over 8 seconds. This Shock is removed and reapplied on each Psionic Blast.
After this attack ends, activate a telepathic cloak to go Invisible for 3 seconds, giving the Opponent a 100% chance to Miss. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.

While the Opponent is suffering from Concussion Stryfe can block Unblockable attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Deal a burst of 217.25 Energy Damage. +500% potency if Invisible.
Gain +3 Telepathic Charges if Invisible.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The second hit in this attack inflicts a non-stacking Passive Shock, dealing 912.45 Energy Damage over 8 seconds. This Shock is removed and reapplied on each Psionic Blast.
After this attack ends, activate a telepathic cloak to go Invisible for 3 seconds, giving the Opponent a 100% chance to Miss. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.
If Stryfe lands an Attack, Blocks an attack, or the Opponent activates a Special Attack, his position is revealed and Invisibility is removed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The first hit and final 2 hits in this attack are Psionic Blasts, each dealing a burst of 260.7 Energy Damage. +80% potency if the Opponent is Shocked.
Psionic blasts gain +52.14 Attack Rating per Telepathic Charge.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain +5 Persistent Telepathic Charges, these last for the rest of the quest but are capped at 100.
Consume all Telepathic Charges, each becoming +1 additional Persistent Telepathic Charge.
Persistent Telepathic Charges cannot be consumed to trigger abilities, but still grant Attack Rating bonuses.
If the Opponent is Shocked, inflict a Passive Concussion for 30 seconds reducing the Opponent's Ability Accuracy by 30%.

sig_info: When gaining Telepathic Charges from any source other than this ability Stryfe has a 5 to 20% chance to gain +1 additional charge.
Whenever cauing a Basic Attack to Glance, Stryfe has a 10 to 30.03% chance to Activate his Special 1 Invisibility for 3 seconds.
Winning a fight converts 25 to 60.04% of Telepathic Charges into Persistent Telepathic Charges.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain +5 Persistent Telepathic Charges, these last for the rest of the quest but are capped at 100.
Consume all Telepathic Charges, each becoming +1 additional Persistent Telepathic Charge.
Persistent Telepathic Charges cannot be consumed to trigger abilities, but still grant Attack Rating bonuses.
If the Opponent is Shocked, inflict a Passive Concussion for 30 seconds reducing the Opponent's Ability Accuracy by 30%.

PSIONIC BLASTS: Psionic blasts occur on Medium, Heavy and several hits in Special 2, these attacks are Psychic, deal Energy Damage instead of Physical and cannot be Evaded.
Reduce the Potency of incoming Passive Direct Damage by 100%.
TELEPATHIC CHARGES - MAX 20: Telepathic Charges are unaffected by Ability Accuracy reduction but cannot be gained while suffering Power Lock, Burn or Drain.
All attacks gain +1.95 Attack Rating per Telepathic Charge.
55% chance to gain +1 Telepathic Charge when landing a Heavy Attack. Chance increased by a flat 15% for each full Bar of Power.
Gain +1 Telepathic Charge when struck by a Critical Hit.
Gain +1 Telepathic Charge each time Stryfe or his Opponent Misses.
When Struck at 5+ Telepathic Charges, consume 5 charges to cause the attack to Glance.
Striking an Opponent or into their Block while they are Unstoppable consumes +2 Telepathic Charges to remove the effect and inflict a Passive Stun for 1.20 seconds. Cooldown 8 seconds.
ON FOURTH LIGHT ATTACK: Consume 1 Telepathic Charge to inflict a Passive Concussion for 12 seconds reducing the Opponent's Ability Accuracy by 20%.
While the Opponent is suffering from Concussion Stryfe can block Unblockable attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Deal a burst of 16.25 Energy Damage. +500% potency if Invisible.
Gain +3 Telepathic Charges if Invisible.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The second hit in this attack inflicts a non-stacking Passive Shock, dealing 68.25 Energy Damage over 8 seconds. This Shock is removed and reapplied on each Psionic Blast.
After this attack ends, activate a telepathic cloak to go Invisible for 3 seconds, giving the Opponent a 100% chance to Miss. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.
If Stryfe lands an Attack, Blocks an attack, or the Opponent activates a Special Attack, his position is revealed and Invisibility is removed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The first hit and final 2 hits in this attack are Psionic Blasts, each dealing a burst of 19.5 Energy Damage. +80% potency if the Opponent is Shocked.
Psionic blasts gain +3.9 Attack Rating per Telepathic Charge.

Consume all Telepathic Charges, each becoming +1 additional Persistent Telepathic Charge.
